dependencies.description: Set the dependency field. See below
dependencies.description_zh: Set the dependency field. See below

getValueFromEvent.description: Specify how to get value from event or other onChange arguments
getValueFromEvent.description_zh: Specify how to get value from event or other onChange arguments

getValueProps.description: Customize additional props with value. This prop will disable valuePropName
getValueProps.description_zh: Customize additional props with value. This prop will disable valuePropName

initialValue.description: Config sub default value. Form initialValues get higher priority when conflict.
initialValue.description_zh: Config sub default value. Form initialValues get higher priority when conflict.

normalize.description: Normalize value from component value before passing to Form instance. Do not support async
normalize.description_zh: Normalize value from component value before passing to Form instance. Do not support async

noStyle.description: No styles, only use field management
noStyle.description_zh: No styles, only use field management

preserve.description: Keep field value even when field removed
preserve.description_zh: Keep field value even when field removed

required.description: Whether it is required. Note that this property is only used to control the appearance and does not contain validation logic.
required.description_zh: Whether it is required. Note that this property is only used to control the appearance and does not contain validation logic.
required.default: false (if rules is set, it would be judged according to rules)

shouldUpdate.description: Custom field update logic. See below
shouldUpdate.description_zh: Custom field update logic. See below

trigger.description: When to collect the value of children node.
trigger.description_zh: When to collect the value of children node.

validateFirst.description: Whether stop validate on first rule of error for this field. Will parallel validate when parallel cofigured
validateFirst.description_zh: Whether stop validate on first rule of error for this field. Will parallel validate when parallel cofigured

validateTrigger.description: When to validate the value of children node
validateTrigger.description_zh: When to validate the value of children node

valuePropName.description: Props of children node, for example, the prop of Switch is 'checked'. This prop is an encapsulation of getValueProps, which will be invalid after customizing getValueProps
valuePropName.description_zh: Props of children node, for example, the prop of Switch is 'checked'. This prop is an encapsulation of getValueProps, which will be invalid after customizing getValueProps

events.name: onClick
events.description: The click event of the list item.
events.description_zh: The click event of the list item.
